original_title: ゴジラ対エヴァンゲリオン・ザ・リアル・4−D
overview: NERV is caught off guard when a mysterious creature arrives in Osaka-III. The Eva Units are sent out, believing it to be an Angel only to discover it's none other than Godzilla, who engages the Eva Units. Godzilla's purpose for appearing is soon revealed  when a cosmic monster descends from above, King Ghidorah. Featured exclusively at Universal Cool Japan.
title: Godzilla vs. Evangelion: The Real 4-D
